text: navu avariginta munna adestu janangagalannu nasagolisiruvevendu avaru kandillave? Bhumiyalli nimage nidilladastu sthirateyannu navu avarige nididdevu hagu akasadindalu avara mele dharala maleyannu surisidevu mattu navu avara taladalli nadigalannu harisidevu â€“ konege, avara papagala karana navu avarannu nasa madidevu mattu avara balika bere janangagalannu munde tandevu
